globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self'; connect-src *; frame-src 'self' *.google.com *.adtrafficquality.google *.doubleclick.net *.userback.io *.googlesyndication.com *.firebaseapp.com *.stripe.com; frame-ancestors 'self' https://google.com https://*.google.com https://*.doubleclick.net; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'wasm-unsafe-eval' *.googletagmanager.com *.clarity.ms *.googlesyndication.com *.adtrafficquality.google *.google.com *.userback.io *.ampproject.org *.gstatic.com *.stripe.com; style-src 'self' *.userback.io *.googleapis.com 'unsafe-inline'; font-src 'self' *.userback.io *.gstatic.com; img-src * data: blob:; media-src 'self' *.gstatic.com blob: data:; base-uri 'self'; object-src 'none'; form-action 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
